mapper.select: SELECT A.id, company_name, plant_name, building_name, device_code, device_name, device_company, device_spec, A.[location], comm_protocol, comm_param, comm_link, device_description, A.create_by, A.create_time, A.update_by, A.update_time FROM O_4Device A JOIN O_3Building B ON A.building_id = B.id JOIN O_2Plant C ON B.plant_id = C.id JOIN O_1Company D ON C.company_id = D.id

SELECT A.id, company_id, plant_id, building_id, device_code, device_name, device_company, device_spec, [location], comm_protocol, comm_param, comm_link, device_description, A.create_by, A.create_time, A.update_by, A.update_time FROM O_4Device A JOIN O_3Building B ON A.building_id = B.id JOIN O_2Plant C ON B.plant_id = C.id where A.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
